131112.title: Try to help

1311121.content:
Finn gathered Bulbasaur as best he could and moved away from the Ursaring. As he stumbled along half dragging his partner, Finn saw a Caterpie beckoning him with wide eyes. Most trainers would have abandoned him and saved themselves. Humans aren't made of the same stuff as Pokeboys. He could have survived this, too long with a Pokeboy that strong and you'd never recover."
